entry.title: $2700 // ==NO FEE===LUXURY 1 BED===BALCONY===ROOFTOP===LAUNDRY
entry.content:
==NO FEE===LUXURY 1 BED===BALCONY===ROOFTOP===LAUNDRY

Listing ID #: 170551
Price: $2,700
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets

Building Amenities

Elevator

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Patio
Terrace

Luxurious 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apartment in the heart of Astoria. Enjoy your own private balcony with amazing bridge views or head up stairs to the Rooftop Terrace where you have amazing views of Manhattan and Queens. Gorgeous Island style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and microwave. Stunning hardwood flooring and high ceilings. Granite Kitchen and marble bath. Large Windows that bring in tons of sunlight. The amenities for this building include: Jacuzzi, Balcony, Rooftop Terrace Access, Gym, On-site Laundry room, **(Indoor Parking Space available for rent)** HEAT, HOT WATER AND COOKING GAS INCLUDED! (YOU ONLY PAY FOR ELECTRICITY) Located in the Heart of Astoria. This is a prime location with everything you need just steps away, Just a 2 minute walk to N and W trains and 6 minutes away from midtown Manhattan. Plenty of Restaurants, Grocery Stores to choose from. Multiple gyms, lounges and coffee shops just around the corner for your convenience. FOR VIEWINGS CALL or TEXT Mashud Ahmed at 917-355-4162 OR EMAIL [email protected]
